server.201: Created — The resource was created successfully.
server.204: No Content — The request was successful but there is no content to return.
server.400: Bad Request — The server could not understand the request.
server.401: Unauthorized — You must be logged in to access this resource.
server.403: Forbidden — You do not have permission to access this resource.
server.404: Not Found — The requested resource was not found.
server.409: Conflict — A resource with the given data already exists.
server.500: Internal Server Error — Something went wrong on the server.
server.502: Bad Gateway — Invalid response from the upstream server.
server.503: Service Unavailable — The server is temporarily unable to handle the request.
server.504: Gateway Timeout — The server took too long to respond.

auth.TOKEN_INVALID: Authentication token is invalid or expired.
